name: Terror Shooter Apocalypse
description:
You remained the sole survivor of the city after a massive enemy attack in this part of Europe.

In the Terror Shooter Apocalypse your goal is to eliminate as many enemies as you can to stay alive and at least rid your city of enemies.

At your disposal you have a good weapon and enough ammunition to attack.

Game Features:
- A big city to defence
- 875 ammo & 1 weapon
- The ability to fight without weapons and many more
- Lots of enemies
